projects.title: Flasq - your hydration assistant
projects.description: Inspired by the circumstances in a global pandemic, Flasq was created to improve the life of possibly billions of people in their home office situation or cheer it up when returning to your physical workplace.

projects.title: FWDpay - Redefining employee expense management
projects.description: In collaboration with FWDpay, a startup originated from a bunq hackathon,  I was exploring several solutions in the field expense management.

projects.title: Uber - Fears on arrival
projects.description: During my application process at Uber for an internship in product design, I got challenged with a nice take-home assignment.

projects.title: Human Technologies: 8 Weeks of Tinkering
projects.description: A time I will probably never forget were the last 8 weeks of my 4th semester, where we individually worked on projects mostly related to microelectronics. This enabled us to bring wild ideas to life and had a lasting effect on me.

projects.title: KOIOS - A place to learn. A place to earn.
projects.description: Following my participation in the Blockchain Minor course, the faculty asked me whether I would be interested in participating in an EdTech project. As I have always been interested in problems and challenges in regards to education, I did not hesistate.  A few months later, the platform is now being used by several hundred students and I am very happy to have embarked on this journey, which has provided me with very helpful learning experiences regarding working more structured, responsive and consistent in my work with Figma, but also taught me, to think more "engineerish".
projects.content: KOIOS - A place to learn A place to earn a3fe9f20294b451bbe8af0860b12ad68

projects.title: Project BB: Keeping beaches clean
projects.description: During my participation in the Blockchain Minor course,  I was working hand in hand with an assignment giver in The Hague, who in collaboration with TU Delft works on a beach cleaning robot. My role in this project was primarily dedicated to research on Blockchain ecosystems and thinking about various scenarios on how this robot could interact in combination with humans.
projects.content: BBBot Blockchain enabled robots for a clean beach  fca6199339c54c64bbf2f86ff4e15d2b 3
